data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Wolverhampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 1, Wolverhampton have a dangerous throw-in.
Mike Dean awards the home team a throw-in.
Wolverhampton to take a throw-in in Sheffield territory.
In the minute 3, Raul Jimenez puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Daniel Podence instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Sheffield in the half of Wolverhampton.
In the minute 4, Throw-in high up the field for Sheffield in Sheffield.
Can Wolverhampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sheffield's half?
Raul Jimenez of Wolverhampton smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 6, Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Goal! Romain Saiss extends Wolverhampton's lead to 0-2 in Sheffield with a header.
Pedro Neto with an assist there.
In the minute 7, Mike Dean signals a Sheffield throw-in in Wolverhampton's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Sheffield at Bramall Lane.
Mike Dean signals a throw-in for Wolverhampton, close to Sheffield's area.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton in their own half.
In the minute 12, Mike Dean signals a free kick to Wolverhampton.
Free kick Wolverhampton.
Free kick for Sheffield in the half of Wolverhampton.
In the minute 15, Throw-in Wolverhampton.
Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Wolverhampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 18, Throw-in Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Sheffield capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Wolverhampton's half?
In the minute 20, In Sheffield a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in the half of Sheffield.
Mike Dean signals a Wolverhampton throw-in in Sheffield's half.
In the minute 23, Sheffield needs to be cautious. Wolverhampton have an attacking throw-in.
Raul Jimenez for Wolverhampton gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Mike Dean awards Sheffield a goal kick.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Sheffield close to the penalty box.
Wolverhampton needs to be cautious. Sheffield have an attacking throw-in.
Sheffield drive forward but Billy Sharp is judged offside.
In the minute 29, Billy Sharp for Sheffield is whistled offside.
Sheffield to take a throw-in in Wolverhampton territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Sheffield goal kick.
In the minute 32, John Fleck of Sheffield is pulled up for offside.
In Sheffield a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Wolverhampton in their own half.
In the minute 33, John Egan for Sheffield has been booked by Mike Dean and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Sheffield in the half of Wolverhampton.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
In the minute 38, Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Oliver McBurnie (Sheffield) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Wolverhampton defenders.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
In the minute 39, Oliver McBurnie (Sheffield) has received a yellow card from Mike Dean.
Can Sheffield get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolverhampton's half?
Can Sheffield capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 41, Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Goal kick for Wolverhampton at Bramall Lane.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton at Bramall Lane.
In the minute 43, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Sheffield close to the penalty box.
Mike Dean awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Sheffield in the half of Wolverhampton.
Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Sheffield.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
Mike Dean blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Bramall Lane.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Sheffield in their own half.
Sheffield to take a throw-in in Wolverhampton territory.
In Sheffield Sheffield attack through Enda Stevens. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 47, Wolverhampton have a goal kick.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Wolverhampton.
Free kick for Sheffield in their own half.
In the minute 49, Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Sheffield.
John Fleck (Sheffield) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
In the minute 51, Sheffield drive upfield and George Baldock gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Wolverhampton defender.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
In the minute 53, Romain Saiss's header is off-target for Wolverhampton.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sheffield.
Wolverhampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 54, Can Wolverhampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sheffield's half?
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Wolverhampton in their own half.
Throw-in Sheffield.
In the minute 58, Sheffield's Billy Sharp is whistled for offside at Bramall Lane.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Mike Dean signals a Sheffield throw-in in Wolverhampton's half.
In the minute 61, Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Romain Saiss for Wolverhampton who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Romain Saiss is back on his feet again.
In the minute 64, Mike Dean signals a free kick to Wolverhampton just outside Sheffield's area.
Mike Dean signals a Sheffield throw-in in Wolverhampton's half.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
In the minute 68, Can Wolverhampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sheffield's half?
Oskar Buur is replacing Pedro Neto for Wolverhampton at Bramall Lane.
Wolverhampton's Romain Saiss gets in a shot on goal at Bramall Lane. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 71, Wolverhampton's Raul Jimenez breaks free at Bramall Lane. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Sheffield at Bramall Lane.
In the minute 71, Free kick Sheffield.
David McGoldrick is replacing Chris Basham for the home team.
Sheffield's Billy Sharp gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Wolverhampton have a goal kick.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Wolverhampton at Bramall Lane.
Wolverhampton's Adama Traore misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sheffield.
In the minute 76, The home team replace Oliver Norwood with Sander Berge.
Wolverhampton make their second substitution with Ruben Neves replacing Daniel Podence.
Sheffield have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 78, Throw-in high up the field for Sheffield in Sheffield.
Can Sheffield capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Wolverhampton's half?
Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
In Sheffield a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Wolverhampton push forward at Bramall Lane and Adama Traore gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sheffield defence.
In the minute 84, Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
Raul Jimenez (Wolverhampton) has hit the post with a header.
Mike Dean awards Sheffield a goal kick.
In the minute 84, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Wolverhampton goal kick.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Sheffield in their own half.
Vitinha is on a sub for Joao Moutinho for Wolverhampton.
Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
In the minute 88, In Sheffield, John Egan (Sheffield) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sheffield.
Adama Traore (Wolverhampton) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Oliver McBurnie (Sheffield) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Sheffield awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Goal kick for Wolverhampton at Bramall Lane.
Sheffield to take a throw-in in Wolverhampton territory.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
It's 0-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Fernando Marcal (Wolverhampton) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
